title: Restore Swiss-French client UI: category filter bar + remove English/Paris strings

requirements.summary: Restore the Client salon-list category filter bar with fixed French categories and correct filtering behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The salon list screen renders a visible horizontal filter bar at the top with labels exactly: "Tout", "Coiffure", "Barbier", "Spa", "Onglerie".
Default selected filter is "Tout" and shows all salons.
Selecting "Barbier" shows only salons that have at least one service with category === "Barbier"; switching back to "Tout" restores the full list.
The filter bar remains present after navigation within the Client dashboard (as long as the salon list is displayed).

file_operations.description: Replace the current dynamic category list ("All" + backend categories) with the fixed French filter buttons in the required order ["Tout", "Coiffure", "Barbier", "Spa", "Onglerie"]. Update state/default selection to "Tout" and ensure salon filtering is driven by salon.services[].category matching the selected category, with "Tout" showing all salons.

requirements.summary: Remove specified Paris/English UI regressions on Client surfaces (badge, section title, welcome header).
acceptanceCriteria: When logged in as a Client, the header badge shows "Suisse Romande" (and never "PARIS 11e").
On the salon list screen, the section title uses "Les meilleures adresses" where it previously showed "Recommended for you".
No UI surface in the login or client header displays "Welcome"; it displays "Bienvenue".

file_operations.description: Update the client badge text to display "Suisse Romande" instead of "PARIS 11e" (keep the pro badge unchanged).
Replace the salon list section title string "Recommended for you" with "Les meilleures adresses" while preserving the existing conditional title behavior when no salons match the selected filter.
Verify the login welcome header is consistently "Bienvenue" (and not "Welcome") and adjust any remaining login-facing welcome text if present.

requirements.summary: Eliminate remaining obvious English strings in Client salon list and salon details flows (errors, empty states, labels, and primary actions) to ensure consistent French UX.
acceptanceCriteria: Salon list: error and empty states do not show English (e.g., replace "Error loading salons", "Coming Soon", "Opening near you soon...", "No salons found", "View all").
Salon details: slot/confirmation UI does not show English (e.g., replace "Available Slots", "Total", "Confirm", "Confirming...").
After these changes, a spot-check of ClientDashboardPage, SalonListSection, SalonDetailsPage, AuthHeader, and LoginPage shows no visible English phrases in normal usage.

file_operations.description: Translate remaining English strings in loading/error/empty states and list UI to French, including: "Error loading salons", "Coming Soon", "Opening near you soon...", "No salons found", "No salons in this category.", "View all", and other visible English labels (e.g., featured badge "Night", rating text containing "reviews", and service count label "services" where displayed in English context).

Translate remaining English UI strings to French, including: "Available Slots", "Total", "Confirm", and "Confirming...". Also replace any obviously English date/day abbreviations shown in DATE_OPTIONS with French equivalents to keep the booking flow fully French.
